mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTS(COMMENT_SEQ, CONTENTS, ID, BOARD_SEQ) VALUES(SEQ_COMMENTS.nextval,#{CONTENTS},#{ID},#{BOARD_SEQ})
mapper.select: select b.BOARD_SEQ, c.COMMENT_SEQ, c.CONTENTS, ui.ID from BOARD b INNER JOIN COMMENTS c ON b.BOARD_SEQ = c.BOARD_SEQ INNER JOIN USER_INFO ui ON c.ID = ui.ID WHERE b.BOARD_SEQ = #{BOARD_SEQ} ORDER BY COMMENT_SEQ
